name: Custom handcrafted 1-3/4 inch wide black leather wristband with a Picture Jasper (matte) gemstone
description: Custom handcrafted 1-3/4 inch wide black leather wristband with a Picture Jasper (matte) gemstone (30 x 15mm) tastefully Inserted. ONE OF A KIND. The leather is dyed / stained and a finish is added to further enhance and protect. The Wristband has a black velvet suede liner for added comfort. The leather is just under 3/16 of an inch thick once the liner is added and and the edges have been burnished to a smooth rounded look. Two line 20 blackened snaps are used for the fastener. FITS WRIST SIZE 7 inches to 7-1/4 inches--- Handcrafted in the USA--- Proper Wrist Measurement: measure around your wrist at the "wrist bump" using a string or a tailors measuring tape. Leather is biodegradable where plastic stays in landfills for years. Free Shipping to the lower 48 states. You can see additional items at the following link: http://www.etsy.com/shop/leatherwristbands

name: Custom handcrafted 2 inch wide Black leather wristband with a Flat Oval Larimar Inserted
description: Custom handcrafted black leather wristband with a Flat Oval Larimar Blue Crazy Lace (30x20mm) tastefully Inserted. ONE OF A KIND. The Wristband is 2 inches wide with a black velvet suede liner for added comfort. The Larimar Blue Crazy Lace flat oval is then inserted as pictured. Dark blue dye is used to encircle the stone for an added highlight. One line 24 solid brass blackened snap is used for the fastener. The leather is approximately 1/8 inch thick and and the edges have been burnished to a smooth rounded look. FITS WRIST SIZE 6 inches to 6 & 5/16 inches. Leather is biodegradable where plastic stays in landfills for years. You can see additional items at the following link: http://www.etsy.com/shop/leatherwristbands
